verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* it was determined \w that|strong="G2919"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* should \w sail|strong="G0636"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Italy|strong="G2482"\w*, they \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w prisoners|strong="G1202"\w* \w unto|strong="G3686"\w* \add one\add* \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Julius|strong="G2457"\w*, a \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w* of \w Augustus’|strong="G4575"\w* \w band|strong="G4686"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* entering \w into|strong="G1910"\w* a \w ship|strong="G4143"\w* of \w Adramyttium|strong="G0098"\w*, we \w launched|strong="G0321"\w*, \w meaning|strong="G3195"\w* to \w sail|strong="G4126"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* the \w coasts|strong="G5117"\w* of \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w*; \add one\add* \w Aristarchus|strong="G0708"\w*, a \w Macedonian|strong="G3110"\w* of \w Thessalonica|strong="G2331"\w*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* the \w next|strong="G2087"\w* \add day\add* we \w touched|strong="G2609"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w Sidon|strong="G4605"\w*. \w And|strong="G5037"\w* \w Julius|strong="G2457"\w* \w courteously|strong="G5364"\w* \w entreated|strong="G5530"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, and \w gave|strong="G2010"\w* \add him\add* \w liberty|strong="G2010"\w* to \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* his \w friends|strong="G5384"\w* to refresh \w himself|strong="G5177"\w*.

And \w when|strong="G2547"\w* we had \w launched|strong="G0321"\w* from \w thence|strong="G2547"\w*, we sailed \w under|strong="G5284"\w* \w Cyprus|strong="G2954"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* the \w winds|strong="G0417"\w* \w were|strong="G1511"\w* \w contrary|strong="G1727"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* when we had sailed \w over|strong="G1277"\w* the \w sea|strong="G3989"\w* \w of|strong="G2596"\w* \w Cilicia|strong="G2791"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pamphylia|strong="G3828"\w*, we \w came|strong="G2718"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Myra|strong="G3460"\w*, \add a city\add* of \w Lycia|strong="G3073"\w*.

And \w there|strong="G2546"\w* the \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* a \w ship|strong="G4143"\w* of \w Alexandria|strong="G0222"\w* \w sailing|strong="G4126"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Italy|strong="G2482"\w*; and he \w put|strong="G1688"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w therein|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1722"\w* we had sailed \w slowly|strong="G1020"\w* \w many|strong="G2425"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w scarce|strong="G3433"\w* were \w come|strong="G1096"\w* over \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w Cnidus|strong="G2834"\w*, the \w wind|strong="G0417"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w suffering|strong="G4330"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, we sailed \w under|strong="G5284"\w* \w Crete|strong="G2914"\w*, over \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w Salmone|strong="G4534"\w*;

\w And|strong="G5037"\w*, \w hardly|strong="G3433"\w* \w passing|strong="G3881"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* a \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w which|strong="G5100"\w* is \w called|strong="G2564"\w* The \w fair|strong="G2568"\w* \w havens|strong="G2568"\w*; \w nigh|strong="G1451"\w* \w whereunto|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \add of\add* \w Lasea|strong="G2996"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* when \w much|strong="G2425"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* was \w spent|strong="G1230"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when \w sailing|strong="G4144"\w* \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \w now|strong="G2235"\w* \w dangerous|strong="G2000"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* the \w fast|strong="G3521"\w* \w was|strong="G3928"\w* \w now|strong="G2532"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w* \w past|strong="G3928"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w admonished|strong="G3867"\w* \add them\add*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Sirs|strong="G0435"\w*, I \w perceive|strong="G2334"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* this \w voyage|strong="G4144"\w* \w will|strong="G3195"\w* \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w hurt|strong="G5196"\w* and \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w damage|strong="G2209"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* of the \w lading|strong="G5414"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w lives|strong="G5590"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="G1161"\w* the \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w* \w believed|strong="G3982"\w* the \w master|strong="G2942"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the owner of the \w ship|strong="G3490"\w*, \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w than|strong="G2228"\w* those \w things|strong="G3588"\w* which were \w spoken|strong="G3004"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* because the \w haven|strong="G3040"\w* \w was|strong="G5225"\w* not \w commodious|strong="G0428"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* winter \w in|strong="G3915"\w*, the more \w part|strong="G4119"\w* \w advised|strong="G5087"\w* to \w depart|strong="G0321"\w* thence \w also|strong="G2547"\w*, if by any \w means|strong="G1513"\w* they \w might|strong="G1410"\w* \w attain|strong="G2658"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Phenice|strong="G5405"\w*, \add and there\add* to \w winter|strong="G3914"\w*; \add which is\add* an \w haven|strong="G3040"\w* of \w Crete|strong="G2914"\w*, and \w lieth|strong="G0991"\w* \w toward|strong="G2596"\w* the south \w west|strong="G3047"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* north \w west|strong="G5566"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when the south \w wind|strong="G3558"\w* blew \w softly|strong="G5285"\w*, supposing \w that|strong="G1380"\w* they had \w obtained|strong="G2902"\w* \add their\add* \w purpose|strong="G4286"\w*, \w loosing|strong="G0142"\w* \add thence\add*, they \w sailed|strong="G3881"\w* \w close|strong="G0788"\w* by \w Crete|strong="G2914"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w long|strong="G4183"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* there \w arose|strong="G0906"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* a \w tempestuous|strong="G5189"\w* \w wind|strong="G0417"\w*, \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Euroclydon|strong="G2148"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w* was \w caught|strong="G4884"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* bear up \w into|strong="G0503"\w* the \w wind|strong="G0417"\w*, we \w let|strong="G1929"\w* \add her\add* \w drive|strong="G5342"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* running \w under|strong="G5295"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w island|strong="G3519"\w* which is \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Clauda|strong="G2802"\w*, we had \w much|strong="G2480"\w* \w work|strong="G3433"\w* to \w come|strong="G1096"\w* \w by|strong="G4031"\w* the \w boat|strong="G4627"\w*:

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* when they had taken \w up|strong="G0142"\w*, they \w used|strong="G5530"\w* \w helps|strong="G0996"\w*, \w undergirding|strong="G5269"\w* the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*; \w and|strong="G5037"\w*, \w fearing|strong="G5399"\w* \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* they should \w fall|strong="G1601"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w quicksands|strong="G4950"\w*, \w strake|strong="G5465"\w* \w sail|strong="G4632"\w*, and \w so|strong="G3779"\w* were \w driven|strong="G5342"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2257"\w* being \w exceedingly|strong="G4971"\w* tossed with a \w tempest|strong="G5492"\w*, the \w next|strong="G1836"\w* \add day\add* they \w lightened|strong="G4160"\w* the \w ship|strong="G1546"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \add day\add* we cast \w out|strong="G4496"\w* with our own \w hands|strong="G0849"\w* the \w tackling|strong="G4631"\w* of the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* \w sun|strong="G2246"\w* \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* \w stars|strong="G0798"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w many|strong="G4119"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w appeared|strong="G2014"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w small|strong="G3641"\w* \w tempest|strong="G5494"\w* lay \w on|strong="G1945"\w* \add us\add*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* that \w we|strong="G2248"\w* should be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w was|strong="G4014"\w* \w then|strong="G3063"\w* taken \w away|strong="G4014"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G5119"\w* \w long|strong="G4183"\w* \w abstinence|strong="G0776"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* stood \w forth|strong="G2476"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Sirs|strong="G0435"\w*, ye \w should|strong="G1163"\w* have \w hearkened|strong="G3980"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w and|strong="G0321"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* have \w loosed|strong="G0321"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Crete|strong="G2914"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* to have \w gained|strong="G2770"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w harm|strong="G5196"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w loss|strong="G2209"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3867"\w* I \w exhort|strong="G5209"\w* \w you|strong="G2114"\w* to be of good \w cheer|strong="G0580"\w*: \w for|strong="G5590"\w* there shall \w be|strong="G1537"\w* \w no|strong="G2071"\w* loss \w of|strong="G1063"\w* \add any man’s\add* \w life|strong="G3762"\w* \w among|strong="G5216"\w* \w you|strong="G4133"\w*, \w but|strong="G3588"\w* of the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* there \w stood|strong="G3936"\w* by \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* I \w am|strong="G1510"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* I \w serve|strong="G3000"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Fear|strong="G5399"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*; \w thou|strong="G4571"\w* must \w be|strong="G1163"\w* brought \w before|strong="G3936"\w* \w Cæsar|strong="G2541"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w lo|strong="G2400"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w given|strong="G5483"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sail|strong="G4126"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w*, \w sirs|strong="G0435"\w*, be of good \w cheer|strong="G2114"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G3779"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w even|strong="G2596"\w* \w as|strong="G5158"\w* it was \w told|strong="G2980"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*.
\w Howbeit|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* be \w cast|strong="G1601"\w* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w island|strong="G3520"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* the \w fourteenth|strong="G5065"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* was \w come|strong="G1096"\w*, as \w we|strong="G2257"\w* were driven up and \w down|strong="G1308"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Adria|strong="G0099"\w*, \w about|strong="G2596"\w* \w midnight|strong="G3571"\w* the \w shipmen|strong="G3492"\w* deemed \w that|strong="G5282"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* drew near \w to|strong="G4317"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w country|strong="G5561"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w sounded|strong="G1001"\w*, and \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \add it\add* \w twenty|strong="G1501"\w* \w fathoms|strong="G3712"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* when they had \w gone|strong="G1339"\w* a little \w further|strong="G1024"\w*, they \w sounded|strong="G1001"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \add it\add* \w fifteen|strong="G1178"\w* \w fathoms|strong="G3712"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5037"\w* \w fearing|strong="G5399"\w* \w lest|strong="G3381"\w* we should have \w fallen|strong="G1601"\w* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* \w rocks|strong="G5138"\w*, they \w cast|strong="G4496"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w anchors|strong="G0045"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w stern|strong="G4403"\w*, and \w wished|strong="G2172"\w* \w for|strong="G1096"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* as the \w shipmen|strong="G3492"\w* were \w about|strong="G2212"\w* to \w flee|strong="G5343"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* they had let \w down|strong="G5465"\w* the \w boat|strong="G4627"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, under \w colour|strong="G4392"\w* as \w though|strong="G5613"\w* they \w would|strong="G3195"\w* have \w cast|strong="G1614"\w* \w anchors|strong="G0045"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w foreship|strong="G4408"\w*,

\w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* to the \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w*, \w Except|strong="G1437"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w abide|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*, \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* the \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* cut \w off|strong="G0609"\w* the \w ropes|strong="G4979"\w* of the \w boat|strong="G4627"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G1439"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* fall \w off|strong="G1601"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w while|strong="G0891"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w was|strong="G3195"\w* coming \w on|strong="G1096"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w besought|strong="G3870"\w* \add them\add* \w all|strong="G0537"\w* to \w take|strong="G3335"\w* \w meat|strong="G5160"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, This \w day|strong="G4594"\w* is the \w fourteenth|strong="G5065"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* ye have \w tarried|strong="G4328"\w* and \w continued|strong="G1300"\w* \w fasting|strong="G0777"\w*, having \w taken|strong="G4355"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* I \w pray|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* to \w take|strong="G4355"\w* \add some\add* \w meat|strong="G5160"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* this \w is|strong="G5124"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w your|strong="G5212"\w* \w health|strong="G4991"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* there \w shall|strong="G5225"\w* \w not|strong="G3762"\w* an \w hair|strong="G2359"\w* \w fall|strong="G4098"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w head|strong="G2776"\w* of any of \w you|strong="G5216"\w*.

And \w when|strong="G1161"\w* he \w had|strong="G2036"\w* \w thus|strong="G5023"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2036"\w*, he \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* gave \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w* in \w presence|strong="G1799"\w* of them \w all|strong="G3956"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w broken|strong="G2806"\w* \add it\add*, he \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w eat|strong="G2068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w were|strong="G1096"\w* they \w all|strong="G3956"\w* of good \w cheer|strong="G2115"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* also \w took|strong="G4355"\w* \add some\add* \w meat|strong="G5160"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* we \w were|strong="G1510"\w* in \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w* two \w hundred|strong="G1250"\w* threescore \w and|strong="G1440"\w* \w sixteen|strong="G1803"\w* \w souls|strong="G5590"\w*.

And \w when|strong="G1161"\w* they had \w eaten|strong="G2880"\w* \w enough|strong="G5160"\w*, they \w lightened|strong="G2893"\w* the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*, and cast \w out|strong="G1544"\w* the \w wheat|strong="G4621"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* it \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, they \w knew|strong="G1921"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* they \w discovered|strong="G2657"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w creek|strong="G2859"\w* \w with|strong="G2192"\w* a \w shore|strong="G0123"\w*, \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w which|strong="G3739"\w* they were \w minded|strong="G1011"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* it were \w possible|strong="G1410"\w*, to \w thrust|strong="G1856"\w* in the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they had taken \w up|strong="G4014"\w* the \w anchors|strong="G0045"\w*, they \w committed|strong="G1439"\w* \add themselves\add* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w and|strong="G0260"\w* \w loosed|strong="G0447"\w* the \w rudder|strong="G4079"\w* \w bands|strong="G2202"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hoised \w up|strong="G1869"\w* the \w mainsail|strong="G0736"\w* to the \w wind|strong="G4154"\w*, and \w made|strong="G2722"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w shore|strong="G0123"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w falling|strong="G4045"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w place|strong="G5117"\w* where two seas \w met|strong="G1337"\w*, they \w ran|strong="G2027"\w* the \w ship|strong="G3491"\w* \w aground|strong="G2027"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w forepart|strong="G4408"\w* stuck \w fast|strong="G2043"\w*, and \w remained|strong="G3306"\w* \w unmoveable|strong="G0761"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the hinder \w part|strong="G4403"\w* was \w broken|strong="G3089"\w* \w with|strong="G5259"\w* the \w violence|strong="G0970"\w* of the \w waves|strong="G2949"\w*.
